exceptions.tactic: intros n A X Y TX TY F HF R HR.
intros n A' X Y TX TY F HF R HR.
intros n A' X' Y TX TY F HF R HR.
intros n A' X' Y' TX TY F HF R HR.
intros n A' X' Y' TX' TY F HF R HR.
intros n A' X' Y' TX' TY' F HF R HR.
intros n A' X' Y' TX' TY' F' HF R HR.
intros n A' X' Y' TX' TY' F' HF' R HR.
intros n A' X' Y' TX' TY' F' HF' R' HR.
intros n A' X' Y' TX' TY' F' HF' R' HR'.

exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

original: intros n A X Y TX TY F HF R HR. induction n as [|n' IHn]. - apply HR. - unfold UExp. fold UExp. apply UExp_mon with (n:=n') in HF. apply HF in HR. apply IHn in HR. apply HR.
